verses.name: 1 Peter 4:15
verses.text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men’s matters.

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:16
verses.text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:17
verses.text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God: and if it first begin at us, what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God?

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:18
verses.text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?
